Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, levy and collect a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $145,640 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year), for a period of five (5) years beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2023, inclusive, for the purpose of constructing, improving and renovating public libraries in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sixth Wd. Fire Protection District No. 1 -- 6.93 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sixth Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Sixth Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six and ninety-three hundredths (6.93) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $144,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating fire protection facilities, vehicles and equipment in the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
